game.name: Veg Uprising
game.genres: Action, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, In-App Purchases, Color Alternatives, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: A real-time tactical stealth strategy game where you control a team of rebellious vegetables. Sneak, crouch, set traps, backstab enemies, and rescue allies. Each mission is a puzzle of timing, terrain, and survival.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A real-time tactical stealth strategy game where you control a team of rebellious vegetables. Sneak, crouch, set traps, backstab enemies, and rescue allies. Each mission is a puzzle of timing, terrain, and survival.
